name: Method to register a new user
description:
The `register()` method, available in the SDK client accepts the following object as input: 
```
{
  firstName: 'John',
  lastName: 'Doe',
  email: 'john.doe@example.com',
  password: 'Strong!987',
  phoneNumber: '000000',
  birthday: '1970/01/01',
  gender: 0, // 0 = Not known; 1 = Male; 2 = Female; 9 = Not applicable
  country: 'JO',
  language: 'AR',
  timeZone: 'Europe/Brussels'
}
```

Executing this method creates a user in FibriCheck Cloud
